full_text: New agricultural laws rushed through parliament by Narendra Modi were thin on detail, and would deregulate the market in several ways. Farmers fear they could be manipulated https://t.co/JflV2TqkH2

localize.full_text: 纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）匆匆通过的新农业法细节不多，将在多个方面放松对市场的管制。农民担心他们会被操纵https://t.co/JflV2TqkH2。
納倫德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）匆匆通過的新農業法細節不多，將在多個方面放鬆對市場的管制。農民擔心他們會被操縱https://t.co/JflV2TqkH2。
